# interPageSpacing

**Type Property**

Space between pages, in points.

## Declaration

```swift
static let interPageSpacing: UIPageViewController.OptionsKey
```

## Discussion

The value should be a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CGFloat-swift.struct] wrapped in an instance of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber]. The default value is zero. An inter-page spacing is only valid if the transition style is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/TransitionStyle-swift.enum/scroll].

## Page options

- **spineLocation**: Location of the spine.
title: interPageSpacing
